scripts.postinstall: (cd server && bun install --frozen-lockfile); (cd web && bun install --frozen-lockfile)
scripts.:dev: trap 'kill 0' EXIT; (cd web && bun dev) & (cd server && bun dev) & wait
scripts.check: bun biome check . && bun run build
scripts.build: (cd web && bun run build) && (cd server && bun run build)
scripts.clean: rm -r node_modules; rm -r **/node_modules; rm -r web/.next web/dist; true
scripts.db: bun db:up && bun db:push && bun db:seed
